ygData.subject: Re: Cast Force
ygData.msgSnippet: I have successfully created this spell. it is an area effect that does around 100hp to each mob, it is a storm type of spell that radiates from whatever ye
ygData.messageBody:
I have successfully created this spell. it is an area effect that does
around 100hp to each mob, it is a storm type of spell that radiates from
whatever ye cast it on. I found both runes to research this spell in Unrest.
(and it is a lvl 24 spell not 29)

Quindinar
----- Original Message -----
From: Samurai7 <samurai7@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 11:01 PM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Cast Force


> From: "Samurai7" <samurai7@...>
>
> Hi,
>
> Does any wizard here have this spell? I can't seem to find the runes to
make
> it if any of you know of a place where I can buy the spell please send me
> some email or post it here thanks. I have heard that it's not a DD spell
but
> a AE spell. I also have heard it's a level 29 spell when the book says
it's
> a level 24 spell. So any help would be nice.
>
>
